scripts.clear-build-cache: rm -rf .cache/ dist/ && mkdir dist && cp -r ./static/* dist
scripts.local: rm -rf .cache/ dist/ && mkdir dist && parcel index.html
scripts.dev: rm -rf .cache/ dist/ && mkdir dist && parcel --host=192.168.178.93 index.html
scripts.build: rm -rf .cache/ dist/ && mkdir dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build ./index.html --public-url ./
